sen.j: 続千載和歌集（しょくせんざいわかしゅう）は、文保2年（1318年）、後宇多法皇の命によって編纂された15番目の勅撰和歌集。
sen.e: Shokusenzai Wakashu (Waka Collection of a Thousand Years Continued) is the 15th imperial anthology of waka (Japanese poetry) by the command of the Cloistered Emperor Gouda in 1318.
Shokusenzai Wakashu (Waka Collection of a Thousand Years Continued) is the 15th imperial anthology of waka (Japanese poetry) by the command of the Cloistered Emperor Gouda in 1318.
Shokusenzai Wakashu (Waka Collection of a Thousand Years Continued) is the 15th imperial anthology of waka (Japanese poetry) by the command of the Cloistered Emperor Gouda in 1318.

sen.j: 主な歌人は、二条為氏、西園寺実兼、藤原為家、藤原定家など。
sen.e: Main contributors include Tameuji NIJO, Sanekane SAIONJI, FUJIWARA no Tameie, and FUJIWARA no Sadaie.
Main contributors include Tameuji NIJO, Sanekane SAIONJI, FUJIWARA no Tameie, and FUJIWARA no Sadaie.
Main contributors include Tameuji NIJO, Sanekane SAIONJI, FUJIWARA no Tameie, and FUJIWARA no Sadaie.
